channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Apple TV app for Fire OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Apple TV app for Fire OS

item.title: CVE-2020-27940|2024-08-04T16:25:43.982Z -- apple -- apple%20tv%20app%20for%20fire%20os
item.description: This issue was addressed with improved file handling. This issue is fixed in Apple TV app for Fire OS 6.1.0.6A142:7.1.0. An attacker with file system access may modify scripts used by the app.
